summary: This document is a forwarded email chain from April 2023 discussing an inquiry about a potential Epstein victim. An individual is asking an FBI Victim Specialist in New York to verify if a specific person, whose name is not provided in the text, is officially listed as a victim. The email highlights challenges in victim identification and coordination of claims.

events.title: Email inquiry about Epstein victim verification
events.description: An external inquiry is made to an FBI Victim Specialist to check if a specific individual is officially listed as a victim of Jeffrey Epstein.

keyFacts: The document is a 2023 email chain discussing verification of an Epstein victim.
An FBI Victim Specialist in New York is asked to check if a specific person is officially listed as a victim.
The inquiry notes that some individuals claim to be victims but have never spoken to authorities or been officially identified.
The specific name of the potential victim is not disclosed in the provided text.
The correspondence highlights ongoing administrative and investigative follow-up related to Epstein victims years after the main case.
